attributes.action: restore fresh talent scotland visa to all post graduate student in scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a few years back,it became a law that after postgraduate work in scotland,graduates were entitled to 2 years work visa but suddenly things changed and our lives have been made miserable by the tier system.our families back home can not join us because we are here raising the unrealistic maintenance fund that was made a criteria,we are suffering seriously because we can not touch the funds in our banks for 3 months or even more because we need to keep hundreds of pounds untouched in our banks and the visa is not guaranteed to be given us,we face a hopeless future after spending thousands of pounds in british schools.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
